DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect ASP1585 pharmacokinetics valsartan 2x2 crossover method
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect ASP1585 Pharmacokinetics Valsartan Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body weight : = < 50.0kg , < 80.0kg Body mass index : = < 17.6 , < 26.4 Healthy judge investigator caregiver subjective objective symptom physical examination data Attending another clinical trial within 120 day study Blood donation within 90 day ( 400ml ) 30 day ( 200ml ) study Receiving drug within 7 day study History allergy drug Having GI disorder History complication liver diseases History complication heart disease History complication respiratory diseases History complication renal disease History complication cerebrovascular disease
